original_text: And if some of the branches be broken off, and thou, being a wild olive tree, wert grafted in among them, and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree;
korean_text: 또한 가지 얼마가 꺾이었는데 돌감람나무인 네가 그들 중에 접붙임이 되어 참감람나무 뿌리의 진액을 함께 받는 자가 되었은즉

sentences.original_text: And if some of the branches be broken off
and thou, being a wild olive tree
and with them partakest of the root
and fatness of the olive tree
